item.title: What’s new in Microsoft Entra – March 2025
item.description: Microsoft has introduced new capabilities in Microsoft Entra to enhance AI security and identity protection. These innovations focus on two main areas: securing AI applications and leveraging AI to bolster security measures. To protect AI applications, Microsoft Entra Internet Access now offers granular, identity-based access controls, allowing organizations to tailor policies for different AI apps based on user roles and risk levels.
